infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Clover Care needs location access to provide location-based services for seniors.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Clover Care needs location access to provide location-based services for seniors.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Clover Care needs camera access to take photos for profile and documentation.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Clover Care needs photo library access to select images for profile and documentation.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Clover Care needs contacts access to help you connect with family members and care managers.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationPermissionDescription: Clover Care needs notification permission to send you important alerts about your seniors.
